page.title: 11EVENTS 1 BISHOP THORNTON
page.content: The village schoolchildren have been learning about local history and decided to make a Masque about a wedding which took place at the old church in Medieval times. In 1470 Robert Castilforde the Chaplain married John Wyttes of Thornton and Margaret, daughter of John Wallworth of Raventoft's Hall. The children made up some tunes and dances to fit the music and words to tell the story. They made some masks for the different characters some good and others evil. They made the costumes and scenery from their own imagination and with the help of much research from books. The children accompanied the Masque themselves with percussion and recorders and brass instruments. The Masque was performed on 29 July at Bishop Thornton annual feast and also in Fountains Abbey grounds on 4 July
